modName: dawnbreaker and dawnguard rune shield changes
summary: changes dawnbreaker to do sun damage instead of fire and dawnguard rune shield to be heavy class shield instead of light like the original
descriptionHtml:
requires dawnguard

changes dawnbreaker to do sun damage instead of fire (and nothing else it still has the same base stats and requires to be recharged) and dawnguard rune shield to be heavy class shield instead of light like the original because for some reason beth made it a light shield when it looks exactly like the original dawnguard shield(except the texture) which is heavy

installation: just put in the data folder and activate
author: kharnzarro
